  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    DoaAnimation
    Objects of this class are responsible for providing support for sprite based animations.
    DoaAnimations
    Responsible for providing a Factory to create Animations for DoaEngine to display.
    DoaButton
    A basic button.
    DoaCamera
    Represents a camera construct that looks at a certain point in 2D space, this point can be animate.
    DoaEngine
    Responsible for creating and supplying the graphics context used for drawing all created DoaObjects, and updating all created DoaObjects.
    DoaEngineInstanceException
    Thrown when certain DoaEngine parts are tried to be instantiated more than once.
    DoaEngineStateException
    Thrown when DoaEngine is tried to put in an illegal state, such as tried to be run whilst already running.
    DoaGraphicsContext
    Responsible for wrapping the Graphics2D class Sun Microsystems provides.
    DoaHandler
    Responsible for keeping track of all DoaObjects.
    DoaImageButton
    A button that can render DoaSprites onto itself.
    DoaKeyboard
    Responsible for catching all fired keyboard inputs at any logical frame.
    DoaLights
    Responsible for providing a tool to create and set scene lights for DoaEngine.
    DoaMath
    Math utilities.
    DoaMouse
    Responsible for catching all fired mouse inputs at any logical frame.
    DoaObject
    Blueprint of all objects that are going to be processed by DoaEngine, all objects that will get updated at every logical frame and will get drawn on the screen must sub-class this class, then it is ensured by DoaEngine that it will be updated and will be drawn on the screen.
    DoaPanel
    A bare bones UI component container.
    DoaRenderingMode
    Specifies the rendering mode of DoaEngine.
    DoaSoundClip
    Easy use version of Clip.
    DoaSounds
    Responsible for providing a Factory to create DoaAudioClips for DoaEngine to play.
    DoaSprite
    Wrapper object for BufferedImages, exists to provide further support for sprite based drawing and animations.
    DoaSprites
    Responsible for providing a Factory to create Sprites for DoaEngine to display.
    DoaTasker
    Abstracts threading and all it's related functionality from the common DoaEngine user.
    DoaTaskGuard
    Wrapper for AtomicBoolean.
    DoaUIAction
    This is a functional interface that is used to utilise the core UI components DoaEngine provides.
    DoaUIComponent
    DoaUIComponent is the root of the UI component hierarchy.
    DoaUIComponentI
    Responsible for providing an interface for UI components DoaEngine will process.
    DoaUIContainer
    DoaUIContainer is the root of the UI component container hierarchy.
    DoaUIContainerI
    Responsible for providing an interface for UI component containers DoaEngine will process.
    DoaUtils
    Useful functions to shorten AND/OR simply code.
    DoaVectorD
    2D double vector.
    DoaVectorF
    2D float vector.
    DoaVectorI
    2D int vector.
    DoaWindow
    Responsible for providing a windowing tool for DoaEngine.
